courseName: International Seminar on European Project Planning
description: International Seminar on European Project Planning OBJECTIVE AND TARGET GROUPSThe objective of the International Seminar in European Project Planning is to provide participants with the skills to transform good ideas into successful European project proposals.The international seminar is addressed to in-service staff working in:- public bodies- universities- schools
modality: PGDip, MA, PGCert, PGCE, Masters Module, Other, MSc
fees: FeesThe enrollment fee is 560 euro per person. Groups composed of at least 6 participants will benefit of a 25% reduction of the enrolment fee
